properties.Name: CustomerBiometric
properties.Description: The automatic recognition of customers based on unique combinations of measurable physical or behavioral characteristics. Examples include fingerprints, iris scanning, face and voice recognition, or hand geometry.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: BiometricTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a biometric type.

Columns.Name: Timestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the associated information is reported, recorded or effective as-of.

Columns.Name: CustomerBiometricTemplate
Columns.Description:
The biometric reference pattern of an individual of the associated biometric stored for matching. 

BioCert devices convert fingerprint information into mathematical templates, so actual fingerprint images are not stored and cannot be reconstructed based on template data.

Columns.Name: CustomerBiometricNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the customer biometric.
